turn.4: Throughout its run, celebrities who have guest starred on "The Fairly OddParents" include: Adam West, Jay Leno, Norm Macdonald, Mary Hart, Chris Kirkpatrick, Alec Baldwin, Ben Stein, Jackie Mason, Jason Bateman, Rick Fox, Gilbert Gottfried, Michael Clarke Duncan, Robin Williams, Brendan Fraser, Patrick Warburton, Gene Simmons, Paul Stanley, Tom Arnold, and Scott Hamilton.
turn.6: Prior to the creation of "The Fairly OddParents", Butch Hartman was working at Cartoon Network on "Johnny Bravo".
turn.7: When did the show first air?
turn.8: In 1997, Fred Seibert contacted Hartman about pitching ideas for his "Oh Yeah!
turn.10: Cartoons" series which he was developing for Nickelodeon, Hartman initially declined the offer.
turn.12: Several months later, "Johnny Bravo" finished and Hartman decided to create his own series instead of going back to working for other studios.
